description: Format of fields that can appear in all Fixture Actions
title: Common Fields Schema

FixtureId.description: The normative Id of the fixture
FixtureId.title: Fixture Id

GlobalSeq.description: Global update sequence. When tracking event sequence numbers, use `Seq` instead.
GlobalSeq.title: Seq

Id.description: Action ID. Messages for the same action will have the same action ID. For example, an unconfirmed action followed by a confirmation
Id.title: Id

Seq.description: Update sequence number for a fixture
Seq.title: Seq

ServerId.description: Internal ID of the server that handled the action
ServerId.title: Server Id

TracingInfo.description: Observability information for the action. Relevant if issues are reported.
TracingInfo.title: Tracing Information

UserId.description: Internal ID of the user that sent the action
UserId.title: Server Id

StatusId.description: The ID for the current game period. See [StatusId](#status-id)
StatusId.title: Status Id

OvertimeNumber.description: Optional. If we are on Overtime, this will have the number of the current overtime period in which this event is happening
OvertimeNumber.title: Overtime Number

VirtualFixture.description: If true, the fixture is a virtual fixture, used to replay events of an existing fixture for test purposes.
VirtualFixture.title: VirtualFixture

Seconds.description: Time in seconds left in the current period. At the start it is the full time for the period (for example, 15 minutes would be 900 seconds). The value decreases with every new action until the end of the period.
Seconds.title: Seconds

PlayerData.description: Data about a player in a team
PlayerData.title: Player Data

preferredName.description: Player name (Last Name, First Name) in normalised Latin chars
preferredName.title: Player Name

fixturePlayerId.description: Player Id in the fixture, used to reference a player in events
fixturePlayerId.title: Fixture Player Id

starter.description: The player is part of the starting team
starter.title: Starter

starred.description: The player has a star in the lineups
starred.title: Starred

gender.description: Information about the gender of the team (which gendered competitions it is playing in)
gender.title: Team Gender

PartiState.description: Information about a team during this game
PartiState.title: Participant State

ActiveTimeout.description: Set to true if the team is currently using one of their timeouts
ActiveTimeout.title: ActiveTimeout

AttackingBasket.description: Set to true if the team is attacking basket
AttackingBasket.title: AttackingBasket

Challenges.description: Number of challenges the team has available, to trigger an instant replay review.
Challenges.title: Challenges

Score.description: Score information, referencing the current score of the game, not the change caused by this action. Score is provided in actions that can modify the score-line
Score.title: Score

Participant1.description: Score for participant 1. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant1.title: Participant 1

Participant2.description: Score for participant 2. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant2.title: Participant 2

OT.description: Overtime score, the key indicating the overtime number and will have as many keys as there were overtimes in the game
OT.title: Overtime Score

^[0-9]+$.description: Overtime score for the corresponding overtime

OTTotal.description: Total overtime score: the sum of scores in all overtimes
OTTotal.title: Total Overtime Score

Period.description: Score during a period, the key indicating the period number, with as many keys as periods in the game. For example, an NBA, WNBA, or NCAAW game will have 4 periods. A NCAA game will only have 2 periods.
Period.title: Period Score

Total.description: Total score: sum of all periods and overtimes
Total.title: Total Score

ScoreParticipantPeriod.description: Score information for a participant in a given period
ScoreParticipantPeriod.title: Score for Participant in Period

UsedTimeouts.description: Number of timeouts the team has used
UsedTimeouts.title: Used Timeouts

Participant1.description: Player statistics for participant 1, by player Id. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant1.title: Participant1

^[0-9]+$.description: Player statistics for the referenced player

Participant2.description: Player statistics for participant 2, by player Id. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant2.title: Participant2

^[0-9]+$.description: Player statistics for the referenced player

PlayerStats.description: Player statistics, usually indexed by the player id
PlayerStats.title: Player Statistics

PlayersOnCourt.description: Player on court for both participants
PlayersOnCourt.title: Players on Court

Participant1.description: Players on court for participant 1, by player Id. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant1.title: Participant1

^[0-9]+$.description: Flag is 1 if player is on court, 0 if not

Participant2.description: Players on court for participant 2, by player Id. Home/away mapping is provided by the `Participant1IsHome` flag on the fixture
Participant2.title: Participant2

^[0-9]+$.description: Flag is 1 if player is on court, 0 if not

PlayerOnCourtFlag.description: Numeric value. It is 1 if the corresponding player is on court, 0 if they are not
PlayerOnCourtFlag.title: Player on court flag
